name: Tour 91
description:
Tour 91 is an action cycling game like Perico Delgado Maillot Amarillo, the other cycling game of the same company.

Players choose a cyclist and compete in a cycling race of four stages. The first stage is against the time. The second stage is a plane stage. The third stage is a mountain stage, and the last stage is a sprint stage. Before competing, players have the option to practice each individual stage.
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, DOS, MSX | Combined View

shot.caption: Game options. Pressing 1 cycles through Telecado, Sinclair, Kempston & Cursor
I think I'm third. This is a time trial so the others must have started sooner to set a pace form me to beat

Another message which translates as "Galician out now" 
I think the Frenchman has quit
Just passed a seemingly topless lady and the message translates as "the best part is jouron". Perhaps that's her name
The translation is "going by the first part". Must be the end of a stage marker or something
The time to beat has just changed as first yellow rider on the bottom of the screen completes the course.
53 kph is the fastest I managed, and then only briefly.
Bashing buttons, even for 1 min 47 seconds, is tiring so being able to pause the action is very handy
End of race : I did it in 2:26:58
